amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered En Bloc# 1: Amendment Nos. 83, 86, 107, 118, 127 and 129 printed in House Report 114-683.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 83, 86, 107, 118, 127 and 129 printed in House Report 114-683. See pages D806 and D807 of the Congressional Record of July 13, 2016 for description of en bloc amendments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Calvert amendments (A069) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A069) offered by Mr. Calvert.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Calvert amendments (A069) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments en bloc (A069) offered by Mr. Calvert.
